entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IL2026 and IL3050 code fixers generate invalid code #100474
  • STJ: JsonNode.ReplaceWith used with an array will result in a node that identifies as array but is not a JsonArray node #100470
  • [API Proposal]: JsonNode.ReplaceWith #100468
  • The type initializer sometimes doesn't execute for an empty struct #100466

Closed

  • [API Proposal]:Count method #100467

PullRequests

Created

  • Force OptRepeat, 2 iterations. Enable in Release. #100473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • PEReader throws exception when using PEStreamOptions.PrefetchMetadata for some assemblies #100472
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Add OptRepeat phase start/end indications #100471
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix non-deterministic trigger of struct type initializers #100469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Fix intermittent failures due to unalignment access #100431
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix allocation of empty array in the frozen heap for collectible types #100444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FixOptRepeat and force repeating #100447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add span detection in Enumerable.First(predicate) #100405
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
